page.title: 14 Employment
page.content: About one fifth of Easthams population are unemployed. Most people work in the big factories like Levers and Vauxhalls,which produce margarine, soap,oil,food,paper,cars and car components. The car factory employs the majority of people in Eastham.Many of the workers have to travel five miles or more to get to work.Quite a number of people in Eastham work shifts. A number of women work in community services,like schools and at Eastham Social Centre. Unemployment is rising in Eastham because robots in certain industries are doing mens work quickly and more efficiently.
